QuestData.Title: Khadgar's Plan
QuestData.Description:
Shattrath must not fall into the hands of the Iron Horde. It is time again for me to get my hands bloody.
We will tell Khadgar we are ready to enter the city and take back what is rightfully ours.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Khadgar near the gates of Shattrath.
QuestData.RewardText: You have done great work with Maraad, Yrel, and Thaelin.
